processors.name: Fetch XML from MVAC REST service

entry.value: def flowFile = session.get() if(!flowFile) return session.adjustCounter("nbVacaturesProcessed", 1, true) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
def flowFile = session.get() if(!flowFile) return session.adjustCounter("nbVacatures", 1, true) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

ID in (select distinct vac_opening_id from SCH_SMP.events union all select id from SCH_VAC.vac_openingen where vac_status in ('AFGESLOTEN','PASSIEF') and trunc(creatie_datum) > add_months(trunc(sysdate),-24))
